messages.subject: kamon of Takamori Seigo
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, since I m a wargamer interested in the samurai, I m searching for pictures of the kamon used in the Satsuma rebellion. Could anybody give me a site
messages.messageBody:
Hello, since I'm a wargamer interested in the samurai, I'm searching
for pictures of the kamon used in the Satsuma rebellion. Could anybody
give me a site where I can find these or describe them to me
Thanks in advance

Walter
